languages.text: {n}Блюститель принимает бокал и осушает залпом. Он явно не пытался распробовать букет и вкус напитка.{/n}
{n}Klein accepts the glass and downs it instantly. Evidently, he is in no state to savour the bouquet and taste of the fine drink you have offered him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Блюститель принимает бокал и осушает залпом. Он явно не пытался распробовать букет и вкус напитка.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Klein accepte le verre et le vide d'un trait. Manifestement, il n'est pas en état de savourer le bouquet et le goût délicat du précieux nectar dont vous venez de le gratifier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Klein accepts the glass and downs it instantly. Evidently, he is in no state to savour the bouquet and taste of the fine drink you have offered him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein accepte le verre et le vide d'un trait. Manifestement, il n'est pas en état de savourer le bouquet et le goût délicat du précieux nectar dont vous venez de le gratifier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Klein acepta la copa y se la bebe de un trago. Es evidente que lo que buscaba no era el aroma ni el sabor de la excelente bebida que le has ofrecido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Klein accepts the glass and downs it instantly. Evidently, he is in no state to savour the bouquet and taste of the fine drink you have offered him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein acepta la copa y se la bebe de un trago. Es evidente que lo que buscaba no era el aroma ni el sabor de la excelente bebida que le has ofrecido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}克莱因接过酒杯，将它一饮而尽。很显然，他这个状态没办法品尝美酒的香醇与芬芳。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Klein accepts the glass and downs it instantly. Evidently, he is in no state to savour the bouquet and taste of the fine drink you have offered him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱因接过酒杯，将它一饮而尽。很显然，他这个状态没办法品尝美酒的香醇与芬芳。{/n}

languages.text: {n}クラインはグラスを受け取り、一瞬で飲み干した。彼は、あなたが差し出した上質な飲み物の香りと味を堪能できる状態ではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Klein accepts the glass and downs it instantly. Evidently, he is in no state to savour the bouquet and taste of the fine drink you have offered him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}クラインはグラスを受け取り、一瞬で飲み干した。彼は、あなたが差し出した上質な飲み物の香りと味を堪能できる状態ではない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Klein nimmt das Gleis entgegen und kippt es mit einem Schluck herunter. Er ist ganz offenkundig nicht in der Verfassung, das Bukett und den exquisiten Geschmack des edlen Getränks wertzuschätzen, das du ihm angeboten hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Klein accepts the glass and downs it instantly. Evidently, he is in no state to savour the bouquet and taste of the fine drink you have offered him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein nimmt das Gleis entgegen und kippt es mit einem Schluck herunter. Er ist ganz offenkundig nicht in der Verfassung, das Bukett und den exquisiten Geschmack des edlen Getränks wertzuschätzen, das du ihm angeboten hast.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Klein, kadehi alıp anında kafaya dikiyor. Anlaşılan kendisine sunduğun kaliteli içkinin ayrıcalığının ve lezzetinin keyfine varacak durumda değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Klein accepts the glass and downs it instantly. Evidently, he is in no state to savour the bouquet and taste of the fine drink you have offered him.{/n}
